[requires]
openssl/1.1.1m
oatpp/1.3.0
oatpp-openssl/1.3.0
boost/1.78.0
cpprestsdk/2.10.18
nlohmann_json/3.10.5
libcurl/7.80.0

geohash/1.0
sqlite_modern_cpp/3.2

epanet/2.2

[imports]
bin, *.dll -> ./bin # Copies all dll files from packages bin folder to my "bin" folder
lib, *.dylib* -> ./bin # Copies all dylib files from packages lib folder to my "bin" folder


[options]
[generators]
cmake
xcode
